resources.string: Hi,\nseems like you find this app useful. Would you consider rating it? This will only take a minute of your time, but encourages further development.
Games can only be saved/restored from the menu!
Click when words are touched in a story item
Not at a commandprompt! Gamestate not saved!
Your library is currently empty! To add games, select \'Browse Catalog\' from the menu. Use \'Import\' if your browser does not hand over your downloads automatically.
File copied. You may delete the original now.
Can\'t bind empty commandline to button!
No games found in the download folder!
Changing the theme requires a restart to take effect. Restart now?
Automatically read out new story items (narration can always be stopped by touching empty space within the item and restarted through a long touch)
